name: Crazy Street Traffic Race
description:
Let the rubber burn with top wheels in CRAZT STREET TRAFFIC RACE. Its a racing game in which players compete in racing events around the world in a variety of different fashions.

Players can compete in single players, earning credit to buy more cars and upgrading your cars.


Awesome Cars
3 Tough Tracks
Performance Upgrades
Realistic Car Controls

HOW TO PLAY

Arrow Keys to Navigate vertical and horizontal

Gamebread
"Live to Play"
